args: Mmm, the sunlight feels so warm and\nnice... This is the perfect time to bask in\nthe courtyard.
Hee hee! Glad you like it.
Melsa's hobby is sunbathing. After hearing this,\nSarisse introduced her to a part of the castle\nthat is particularly warm and bright.
It's super cozy here! Everyone in the castle\ncomes to this place for breaks and junk.
Truly? ...Ah, speak of the faerie—\nit's Notte. How are you?
Doin' great. What're you two up to?
We just dropped by for a little me time.\nSame for you, yeah?
Yeppers! I love relaxing with the sun on\nmy face here. It feels UH-MAY-ZING.
Do you also enjoy basking in the sun,\nNotte?
But not just here—I also love doing it in\nbig open meadows, or up in the branches\nof a tree.
I'm always on the prowl for new spots,\nknow what I mean?
Always on the prowl... Good heavens!
My apologies. I just realized something.
I think I may have become a little too\ncomplacent in my sunbathing.
I've become satisfied with simply lying out\nin the same old places.
Not really sure I'm following you here.\nIs there some art to basking in the sun?\nI thought you just kinda...laid there.
An art to basking... Yes, I like the sound of\nthat—and I am going to master said art!
And on that note, Notte, might I call YOU\n＂master＂? As in ＂the master of\nsun-drenched locations.＂
Heck YES you can call me ＂master!＂\n...Ahem! Go on, then. Ask me anything,\nmy sun-loving disciple.
Not really sure what to make of this...\nbut Melsa looks like she's having fun,\nso what the heck!
Master, would you please share your\nfinest location for enjoying the sun?
The SUPER best one? Lemme see here...\nMan, I've tried a bunch, but the best...?\nA-ha! It's that one place!
Tell me, master! I burn to know!
It's on top of {player_name}'s\nnoggin! Oh man, that is the crème de la\ncrème of sunny perches.
His hair's soft and fluffy—and sooo warm!\nSo, yep! That's it. On his head.
I see. That certainly does sound...nice.

Right? Heck, now that we're talking about
it, I super wanna be perched on ol'
{player_name}'s head soaking
up some sweet rays.
So yeah, I'm gonna go find him.\nSmell ya later!
I'm ever so grateful for your valuable\nteachings, master!
On top of {player_name}'s head...\nSo be it.
Um, you know you can't ACTUALLY fit on\nhis head, right?
I understand that. But perhaps there is a\nway for me to recreate the experience.
For example, if I started by attempting to\nreplicate the feeling of being wrapped up\nin his shaggy mane...
Well, I suppose I could throw a bunch of\nstraw on the ground. Lemme give that a\nshot. Hang on...
...Right then! One bed of straw.\nWhatcha think?
Thank you, Sarisse. Now let me see how\nthis feels...
Hmm. It's warm... Soft... Rather inviting...
Yeah, but is it giving you the best basking\nof your life like it's supposed to?
Hmm... Well, I'm not entirely sure I would\nsay it's the BEST.
So, it's not quite right somehow. Hmm.\nWhat could we do about that?
There's nothing for it—I'll simply have to\nfind a creature large enough for me to\nsit atop its head.
Wow, okay. That's a tall order. Buuut...
Of course! A dragon! I'll bask in the warm\nrays of the sun atop a mighty dragon!
I was just about to say that!
All right, let's go ask Midgardsormr.
Come on, we just wanna spend a couple\nminutes up there! What's the harm?
My issue is not with how long you would\nbe atop me. The issue is that I am not a\nbed to begin with.

I understand this to be a rather forward
request—truly I do. But might you find
it in your heart to allow us up there for
just a moment?
...Hrmph. Your eyes have such purity—\nI see that your appeal comes from the\nheart.
In that case, I put a question to you,\nsylvan: For what purpose are you willing\nto go to such lengths?

Well, you see, my master—that is,
Notte—told me the finest sunbathing
was found atop a person's head, and I
am trying to recreate the experience.
I must have misheard you just now.\nYour master is...Notte? The faerie?
Yes. She knows ever so many places to\nsoak up the sun's mighty rays!
We share a common interest in this,\nand I have great respect for her talents.
I see now. Yours is another bond that\nbridges the gap between races. A form\nof pact, if you will.
Very well. Your request is granted.
Though I am reluctant to allow it,\nyou may clamber atop me this\nsingle time.
I'm going to climb up on your back now,\nMidgardsormr. Ready? Here I goooo!
I'm coming up as well! ...Hnnnngh!\nGoodness, he's taller than he looks.
I KNEW a dragon would be big enough!\nRight then. Lemme just spread the straw...
Oh yeah, that's the stuff. C'mere, Melsa!
Ah, but the scenery is gorgeous!
Right?! I mean, it's the same old courtyard\nas always, but something about it feels so\nfresh and new when you're up here.
This is like lying on top of a hill.\nAh, but it is wonderful!
Oh, and there's a breeze now!\nYes, that's perfect...
I summoned a small wind for you in order\nto enhance the experience—I am pleased\nthat you find it enjoyable.
Ha! She's conked out already. Guess this\nreally IS the best place for sun.
(I'm so happy... I never knew a spot this\nwonderful existed...)
(And it's all thanks to Sarisse and Notte...)
(And yet, there must be so many other\njoys like this I've yet to discover...)
